title: Number of Carnival Corporation & plc passengers worldwide 2007 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of passengers in millions, containing a total of 13 data points.
In general Number of passengers in millions has rose over the Year.

Number of passengers in millions is gradually increasing from 2007 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2015, roughly increasing from 2015 to 2016, roughly constant from 2016 to 2018, and lastly roughly increasing from 2018 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Number of passengers in millions, of value 12.9 was reached at Year 2019
Minimum Number of passengers in millions about 7.67 was reached at Year 2007
